title: WBC/4S&P-Update Favicon
custom_preconds: As a WBC fan, I want to see the WBC favicon when I bookmark a page.
custom_expected:
-MLB logo is replaced as the favicon with the WBC logo (attached) on the 4s&p pages

Stats

title: Rosters-Redirect Temporary VSM page
custom_preconds: As a marketer with the WBC, I do not want users to access the Rosters section of the WBC website until we have officially announced WBC Tournament rosters.
custom_expected:
-WBC Rosters redirects to a new Teams landing page

https://www.mlb.com/world-baseball-classic/roster/* redirects users to https://www.mlb.com/world-baseball-classic/teams

Clicking/tapping or accessing /roster URL sends users to /teams

title: Add Tournament logos to repo
custom_preconds: As a fan, I want to see WBC Tournament logos on site.
custom_expected:
-Attached logos are renamed and added to logo repo

https://github.mlbam.net/site-mlb-aws/bam-team-logos/tree/master/logos
